entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character in the story, mentioned as being angry and excited about finding Voldemort.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A person who is still being looked for by Harry Potter and his friends.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist in the story, mentioned as someone that Harry Potter and his friends are trying to find.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Harry's sister, who is going to bed because she hasn't been sleeping well.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who looks away pointedly when Ginny kisses Harry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend, who leans forward to tell him something she found out in the library.

relationships.description: Harry Potter and his friends are searching for Snape.
Harry Potter and his friends are also searching for Voldemort.
Ginny kisses Harry before going to bed.
Hermione leans forward to tell Harry something she found out in the library.
